reviews.review_text:
מושלם מושלם מושלם!
We absolutely love this place. Been here 3 times during our vacation in Goa.
The dishes are a good portion and fair prices. They are DELICIOUS and high quality.
The complimentary buns are so soft and perfect. The chicken is tender, fish is fresh and pasta is flavorful (spicy). Great margaritas and desserts.
The chef always personally welcomed us, and the staff is attentive, helpful, profesional and kind.
I highly recommend this place.

Welcomed with such warmth, all the staff were so attentive and friendly. The chef's son is a great host and welcomed us at our table. The food was fantastic and fresh. Would recommend the rum and lemon Prawns starter. Main course portions were very generous, would suggest if choosing the lobster thermidor to share this as it generously comes with 2 sides and salad. During our meal we also had chef Soumyen himself come to our table to see how everything was. All in all we had a fantastic experience and would definitely come again.

Chef Soumyen's Kitchen in Candolim is an absolute must-visit! At first the reviews seemed too good to be true but from the moment we walked in, the cozy, welcoming vibe of the place made us feel right at home.

The food here is simply outstanding. Every dish we tried was bursting with flavour and beautifully presented – you can tell there’s so much care and thought behind each one. The pork chops were cooked to perfection with a delectable spicy sauce that the Chef very kindly made for us, and the desserts? Pure bliss!

What really makes this place special is Chef Soumyen himself with whom we had a lovely and heart warming conversation. He always personally checks in with guests, and you can see how much passion he pours into every detail, from the menu to the service. It’s rare to find that kind of dedication these days. His son who greeted us was an absolute delight. The staff is very polite and kind as well and they add another layer of perfection to the already wonderful place.

If you’re looking for a dining experience that’s a perfect mix of great food, a lovely atmosphere, and genuine hospitality, this is the place to be. We cannot recommend it enough!!!
